tweets.text: @RichardJFollett @PangColl @EnvAgencySE @BritishRowing If there is any help required with #flooding do get in touch with @Khalsa_Aid! They have sand, sandbags, snacks and volunteers!

Appropriately on #WorldWetlandsDay I'm drafting the first case study of estuarine #rewilding to appear on @RewildingB network pages - @WWTSteart. Astonishing carbon sequestration figs and biodiversity benefits emerging from this @EnvAgency flood risk management project. https://t.co/qX0Rd7eLez

The Two Valley‚Äôs project is part of the Defra ¬£15m NFM programme and a very successful EA and WWT partnership in West Somerset, helping to reduce flood risk. Great community and landowner involvement supporting nature based solutions @EnvAgencySW @tuinz07 https://t.co/KQdksQh72x
@AgainstSewage @RussellB1ggs @EnvAgency Crap

Brearley Fields this morning, soon to be wetlands, I can‚Äôt wait üòä it definitely lends itself to a wetlands project After the deluge over the last few days it‚Äôs pretty full. Soon it will be attracting some wonderful wildlife @Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE #wetlands #nature https://t.co/5jqIDArwrj
Lots of #flooding here in Maidstone, Kent this morning, more rain due tomorrow won‚Äôt help this situation at all! @EnvAgency #loveukweather https://t.co/MMo4hoqjEq

tweets.text:
Councillors in Cambridgeshire are calling on the @EnvAgency to explain why legal action has not been taken against those responsible for illegally dumping 122,000 tonnes of waste in the Fens.
https://t.co/oYjI8zSYBs

@UNBiodiversity @IPBES Take note @EnvAgency Board! UK rivers are being polluted by #sewage at a disgusting rate & it could be fixed, if @DefraGovUK back it.... Will they? Regulation isn't working for water quality. @JamesBevanEA, have you watched A Perfect Planet Episode 5? There's a message for you. https://t.co/6jPEs6h23O
#bluecarbon #saltmarsh #biodiversity #wetlands #coastal @WWTSteart @H_Mossman @RachelBurdenEA @NESouthWest @EnvAgencySW #WorldWetlandsDay https://t.co/aozyZoibId

tweets.text: The wetland @CroxtethHall is working well. Lots more capacity to help reduce #flood risk. Imagine the impact if there were a series of ponds like this all the way along the watercourse! #NFM @EnvAgencyNW @ccnw1 @cpvolgroup @lpoolcouncil https://t.co/0h3xCFT1Ze

#RT @CaroleNewman: RT @Paulofengland1: @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency As above, we can't enjoy our green spaces due to landfill gas which is harmful to health, the poplars needs closing down. Many complaints already put in but the gas persists, why is the EA allowing our health to‚Ä¶

Even when landfills are closed they still need monitoring to make sure that #Landfill gas, which contains #Methane, a potent #GreenhouseGas, isn‚Äôt escaping into the #Environment. #ClimateEmergency #LandQuality #RegulatingIndustry https://t.co/80iXqhYiL7
@garywaggintails @penny_short @nenescape @EnvAgencyAnglia @CostaCoffee Wouldn‚Äôt that be lovely.

tweets.text:
Surface water #flooding is possible in parts of northern and central England due to rain falling on saturated ground.

Stay safe and don‚Äôt walk or drive through flood water. 

For guidance on #SurfaceWaterFlooding in your area, contact your local authority. 

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/GUyF4cRfLT

A groundwater flood alert has been issued for east Kent.

We are working extremely closely with the @EnvAgencySE @Kent_cc and @SouthernWater to tackle any problems that might come our way.

Full update: https://t.co/WmmGJa33p2 https://t.co/To6JzCRZyA

urls.title: Flooding
urls.description: It might seem counterintuitive, but adding water in the right places could be the answer to our growing flooding problem.

What is #NaturalFloodManagement? üíß

As WWT's Carina Gaertner explains, we focus on wetlands because they provide an effective solution to surface runoff and water storage...

tweets.text:
Appearing before the Public Accounts Committee on 14th Jan 2021 Sir James Bevan CEO of the @EnvAgency said "Almost by definition, we are not allowing people to discharge sewage into chalk streams".

Let's just check that statement shall we. https://t.co/tAAPJW9Wge

For #WorldWetlandsDay - here's one we (and @EnvAgencyNW) made earlier! One of three wetland areas we've created next to the River Lyvennet, it's creating valuable wildlife habitat, slowing the flow of water off the land into the river & is #carbonstorage. #nfm #CumbriaRRS https://t.co/NHtQLIbNkh

@joypenzer @ClaireDinger @55motown @westrowhendo @saveferriby2020 @JuliaBradbury @ArroJoanne @friends_earth @energyestuary @EnvAgencyYNE @East_Riding @BadgerTrust @Humberbeat @HullRebellion @XR_BSE @BarnOwlTrust @ChrisGPackham @BBCSpringwatch @Wykeland @RSPCA_official Appalling levels of habit destruction on the #MeltonFields hill this morning @ClaireDinger https://t.co/l1ZnrJpheH

tweets.text: @AliDriverUK @holnicoteNH @RewildingB @WWTSteart @EnvAgency @EG_Cunningham this is what I was talking about last week - great work @WWTSteart

It's LGBT+ History Month! We're proud to support our LGBT+ staff.

Our @LGBTHM staff network will be running events on this year's theme of Mind, Body & Spirit to help staff remain connected, even when we can't celebrate in person like we did here in 2017.

#LGBTHM21 | #TeamEA https://t.co/OBRaadM0Nf

All systems go @WildTroutTrust @EnvAgencyYNE #partnership Riparian Tree Fund. Drier species on slopes with alder to fill on banks - Cosh Beck. Fencing lines along Skirfare and important trout spawning tribs marked up. Benefits - shade, #NFM, diffuse ag #pollution, habitat.... https://t.co/8KkMmTZGHV

@MariaHerlihyEA @EnvAgencySE @MarkHill03 @Jennifer_Hil1 We asked for these to be put in yesterday. We explained to staff on the ground (who did not appear very empowered or knowledgeable) that if they were not put in, we would have increased flooding overnight impacting many residents. Nobody listened.

Aim is reconnecting the River Aller to its surrounding landscape with a slower, more complex pattern of channels, pools & wetlands. Reduces flood risks for people in Bossington & Allerford & on A39, creates bigger, better wildlife habitats. Also funded @EnvAgencySW @Interreg2Seas https://t.co/G9oLtrMghY

Today is #WorldWetlandsDay so here is a short thread featuring three of the wetlands that we have built in the last 3 years. The wetlands were built with the support of partners @EnvAgencyNW  @natural_course @theriverstrust @unitedutilities @wyrecouncil, landowners and developers https://t.co/AAVj6MEnnR
